name: backend
description: # **1. AUTHENTICATION & USER MANAGEMENT (BASIC SETUP)**   - **POST** `/api/auth/register` → Register new users (Job Seekers, Employers, Admins)   - **POST** `/api/auth/login` → Authenticate users and generate JWT   - **POST** `/api/auth/logout` → Log out user and invalidate session   - **POST** `/api/auth/forgot-password` → Request password reset link   - **POST** `/api/auth/reset-password` → Reset password with token
